name: data-call-manager
description: SLA Data Call Management System with File Parser

scripts.start: node -e "require('http').createServer((req,res) => { const fs=require('fs'), path=require('path'); let file = req.url === '/' ? '/public/index.html' : req.url; let filePath = '.' + file; if(fs.existsSync(filePath)) { let ext = path.extname(file); let contentType = ext === '.css' ? 'text/css' : ext === '.js' ? 'text/javascript' : 'text/html'; res.writeHead(200, {'Content-Type': contentType}); res.end(fs.readFileSync(filePath)); } else { res.writeHead(404); res.end('Not Found'); } }).listen(3000, () => console.log('Server running at http://localhost:3000'))"
